alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Jefferson; Lonoke; Monroe; Prairie (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 6:07PM CDT until May 07 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Prairie County in central Arkansas... Southern Lonoke County in central Arkansas... Central Monroe County in eastern Arkansas... North central Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas... Northwestern Arkansas County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 607 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Humphrey, or 10 miles west of Stuttgart, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Stuttgart... Lonoke... Clarendon... Hazen... De Valls Bluff... Carlisle... Holly Grove... Humphrey... Fredonia... Humnoke... Keo... Ulm... Roe... Barrettsville... Dobbs Landing... Peppers Landing... Brummitt... Prairie Center... Parkers Corner... McCreanor... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
